text:
Students will use Electromyography (EMG) to investigate their own muscle activity.

Learning Objectives

Students will use computation to acquire, digitize, and make sense of muscle electrical activity (EMG).

NGSS Alignment

Under development

Formative Assessment

EMG and Learning Journals

Materials

For each group of 3-4 students:

  • EMG shield & Arduino board,
  • EMG surface electrodes (each student will need 3; students should save these electrodes for subsequent activities)
  • Blue USB cable
  • Orange cable with alligator clips (all these materials are part of the Backyard Brains Claw Kit)
  • Hand gripper
